lead_paragraph: Steve Morabito of Switzerland won the fifth stage of the Tour de Suisse yesterday, and Ángel Vicioso of Spain took the overall lead. Morabito finished the 130.5-mile stage from La Chaux de Fondsin to Leukerbad in 5 hours, 37 minutes and 48 seconds. Jurgen van Goolen of Belgium was runner-up, 14 seconds back. Vicioso, two seconds farther back in third, took the overall lead from Nick Nuyens of Belgium.
